column1: I don’t know how you were capable of such destruction.
You are lucky I am such a generous man. I am giving you one last chance.
I can’t stop you from here, but I can promise you a better life. A life of comfort.|BEXOS|10
You won’t need to worry about money.
And you will not need to worry about working another day.
Put an end to this. You can thrive, you can look out for yourself, you can succeed.|BEXOS|10
